pages.text:
Do you want to join our team at one of the Gecko’s Hospitality Group locations?
We strive to bring together caring, warm, fun, intelligent people who love to serve!
NOTICE: Applicant should read the following information carefully before filing out any of the questions on this form. We are an equal opportunity employer and fully subscribe to the principles of equal opportunity. It is our policy to seek and employ the best qualified personnel in all positions without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, disability, national origin or any other basis made unlawful by either state or federal law. It is our policy to comply with all federal and state employment statutes. Information requested on this application will not be used for any purpose prohibited by law. A job description your position will be made available and is incorporated herein.
Geckos Employment Form
ALL FIELDS ARE REQUIRED - Social Security Number will be required before employment can begin.

1.  Gecko's Hospitality Group maintains a safe and drug free environment for all its team members. As a condition of your employment, you may be required to participate in drug testing consistent with Florida law. Gecko's Hospitality Group reserves the right to deny employment to any applicant who tests positive for drugs.
2.  I understand that misrepresentation or omission of facts called for is cause for dismissal and that my
employment is substantially dependent on truthful answers to the foregoing inquiries and my ability to meet the minimum requirements of the job description.
I have read these statements and answers to these inquiries.

Gecko’s Restaurants Raise Over $11K for Mote in Longstanding Partnership Honoring Dr. Eugenie Clark
On August 6, Gecko’s Hospitality Group (GHG) presented a check for $11,070 to Mote Marine Laboratory & Aquarium in front of the Mote Science Education Aquarium (SEA), which is set to open soon at Nathan Benderson Park. Read Full Article
read more
Sarasota Magazine: After Back-to-Back Hurricanes, the Local Tourism Industry Focuses on Recovery
Read Sarasota Magazine's article on how the hospitality industry is recovering after the 2024 hurricane season. The hospitality industry was devastated by Hurricanes Helene and Milton, but business owners and employees say they’re on the mend. Read the Full Article...
read more
Sarasota Magazine: Where to Take Your Kids to Eat in Sarasota
Kids’ palates are more refined than ever, which means sloppy joes and Stove Top stuffing won’t always cut it. Gecko's Grill & Pub is included in Sarasota Magazine's list of 12 restaurants the whole family can enjoy. Read The Full Article Here.
read more

Gecko's Ongoing Specials
Gecko's
Super Hours
Every Day!
Gecko’s Super Hours EVERY DAY from 3-6 pm
$1 off Specialty Cocktails, Wines By the Glass
$5 off 750ml Bottled Wines
$6 Select Call Brands ; Discounted Well drinks ; Discounted Draft Beer Selections
(Upcharge for certain mixers may apply)
Drink Menu
Gecko’s
19th Hole Special
Every Day!
Score a free drink with Gecko’s!
Bring in your golf scorecard before dusk on your day of play and receive your choice of a free well drink cocktail, a free 16 oz. draft domestic beer or free glass of house wine with the purchase of any appetizer or entree.
One scorecard per person per day.May not be combined with any other promotional coupons or gift certificates. Not redeemable for cash or gratuity.
Gecko’s
Trivia Nights
Think while you drink!
Gather your friends, co-workers or family and join us for a fun-filled evening. Prizes, specials and FUN!
Jump To Our Events Calendar!
